meanings.definition: A person or thing that precedes others in a line or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The forerank of the parade was the marching band.
meanings.sent2: The forerank of students led the way to the school assembly.
meanings.sent3: The forerank of ducks waddled proudly ahead of the rest.
meanings.sent4: The forerank of cars in the traffic jam seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent5: The forerank of books on the shelf caught the librarian's eye.

meanings.definition: To be in the leading position or rank.
meanings.sent1: She foreranks the team with her exceptional skills.
meanings.sent2: The experienced captain foreranks the crew during missions.
meanings.sent3: The enthusiastic puppy foreranks in playfulness among its siblings.
meanings.sent4: His determination foreranks all obstacles in his path to success.
meanings.sent5: The bright star foreranks the others in the night sky.

meanings.definition: To come before in time or order.
meanings.sent1: The appetizers forerank the main course at the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: The morning sun foreranks the moon in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The early bird foreranks the other animals in waking up.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter foreranks any sadness that may follow.
meanings.sent5: The first snowflakes forerank the winter season.
